description:
Kagamihara Nadeshiko joins the Outdoor Activites Club. Shima Rin finds out that they go to the same school, but avoids her, preferring to camp alone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bienvenue au cercle de plein air !
Welcome to the Outdoor Activities Club!
أهلاً بكم في نادي النشاطات في الهواء الطلق
ようこそ 野クルへ!
야외 활동 서클에 오신 걸 환영합니다!
